name: Wheeler Real Estate Investment Trust, Inc.
description: Wheeler Real Estate Investment Trust, Inc. is a real estate investment trust (REIT) focused on the acquisition and management of income-producing retail and mixed-use properties. Founded in 2012 and headquartered in Virginia Beach, Virginia, the company aims to provide shareholders with a reliable income stream and capital appreciation through its diversified portfolio of properties. Wheeler REIT primarily invests in grocery-anchored shopping centers and other retail assets, strategically located in markets with strong demographics and growth potential. The company emphasizes community engagement and sustainability, often revitalizing underperforming retail spaces into thriving community hubs. With a dedicated management team and a focus on operational excellence, Wheeler REIT is committed to enhancing property values and optimizing tenant relationships. As part of its growth strategy, the company also seeks to explore new opportunities in the broader real estate market, including mixed-use developments and partnerships. Through a disciplined approach to investment and asset management, Wheeler aims to deliver strong returns to its investors while fulfilling its mission to enrich the communities it serves.

seo.meta_title: Wheeler Real Estate Investment Trust, Inc. | Retail Real Estate Solutions
seo.meta_description: Explore Wheeler REIT, a leader in retail real estate investment. Discover our commitment to community-focused retail properties and sustainable growth.

faq.question: What does Wheeler REIT specialize in?
faq.answer: Wheeler REIT specializes in acquiring and managing income-producing retail and mixed-use properties.

faq.question: Where is Wheeler REIT headquartered?
faq.answer: Wheeler REIT is headquartered in Virginia Beach, Virginia, USA.
